subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Syracuse’s thumping of Marquette could be viewed as a time capsule moment for a disappearing genre: an old-fashioned Big East basketball game with Coach Jim Boeheim leading the way.
snippet: Syracuse’s thumping of Marquette could be viewed as a time capsule moment for a disappearing genre: an old-fashioned Big East basketball game with Coach Jim Boeheim leading the way.
